source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description:
Use: Channel to vent flames for 2 sec, dealing 2.9 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies.

Mechanical enemies become Superheated, taking 138,265  additional Fire damage when struck by your next harmful ability. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Push the Big Red Button, launching a missile barrage which deals 1.8 million Fire damage split among all enemies in the area. Deals increased damage when striking multiple targets. (2 Min Cooldown)
